--------------------------------	
Fossil-fuel production data from CEDS until 2014, then SSP1-1.9
http://www.globalchange.umd.edu/ceds/ceds-cmip6-data/
calculated by summing checksum totals for each year
SSP data from J. Rogelj
HDG Oct 18
--------------------------------
